name: Knock-knock
blurb: Ready Or Not, Here I Come

rewards.reward: Thanks for your support! You will get a free digital copy (PC or Mac) of the game at half price. In addition to the game, you will receive certain information concerning the gameplay, which will mainly cover the "dos and don'ts" of the game.

In addition to the digital copy of the game and the secret tactics advice, pledging this amount will get you the Digital Extended Edition of the game's soundtrack. Take note that along with the tracks used in the game, the Extended Edition will include a number of unused tracks and tracks inspired by the events taking part in the game.

In addition to the digital copy of the game and the secret instructions, we will send you a limited edition digital art-book containing production sketches as well as a number of behind-the-scenes stories, incidents we had to face while we worked with the ominous archive. Your name will be mentioned in the credits as well.

Regrettably, we were forbidden to disclose any information with regard to this package. However, this blind bargain would net you a very special premium in addition to all the goodies mentioned above.

In addition to everything mentioned above, you will be assigned a so-called \u00absurrogate\u00bb. We will create your personal tree in the forest (and the forest is far more than a mere bunch of trees in the game). The \u00absurrogate\u00bb is something between a charm and a tomb where one's misfortunes could be buried. This allows the player an additional layer of security/protection. No guarantees: we merely follow the instructions of The Originator.
You\u2019ll get everything mentioned above, 5 digital copies of the game and a printed art-book signed by the developers who would manage to complete the project with their sanity intact.

In addition to everything mentioned above, you\u2019ll get the opportunity to modify the head of the main hero. You will get 10 digital copies of the game with the altered character and you will be added to the credits as a sponsor.

You\u2019ll get everything mentioned above and we will plant a tree on your behalf. It could be an oak, a chestnut, an ash, an aspen, a pine tree, a fir tree or a blueberry bush. We will create a special place in the middle of the desert, and the trees that we are going to plant will make a grove, and each tree will bear a name of the one who made it possible. Rest assured that we will be taking good care for this grove and that we will do anything to allow it to grow even more till it becomes a true forest.

Besides all the previous bonuses, you\u2019ll have the opportunity to change the information in the journal of the main hero, adding personal information intended to frighten anyone who is unaware that the altered version of the game exists. You will get 10 digital copies of this version. In the credits, you would be mentioned as a co-producer of the project.
